1.content: Which character would you like to start off with?
1.title: Choose your character

choices: Floor ice cream makes you fat! (Overeating/Laziness)
11.content:
So Pit is the lucky winner?

Pick a story to determine how he will gain.
11.title: How will he gain?

113.content: So who'll be forcing Pit to eat?
113.title: Stuffing an angel!

1132.content:
Pit was enjoying a nice, relaxing holiday. Paluntena had given him some time off now Skyworld was at peace and, while reluctant to leave his goddess, the angel accepted. Staying true to the angel's code of conduct, he was still outfitted in his usual wear. With Hades gone the underworld had resumed normal order and Viridi agreed to leave the humans alone for a while. Pit breathed a sigh of relief knowing that he could just relax in peace.

Or could he?

Unbeknownst to the angel, a dark force watched from afar. They had been planning to use Pit's absence as an excuse to take over Skyworld but the angel seemed ready to battle again at a moments notice, even if it would end his holiday. A thought struck them however. Pit was alone. No Goddess to help him. No flight. No additional weapons. Practically prime for the picking.

But now problem two. They couldn't kill Pit because Palutena would just revive him. And even if they kidnapped him, he had a habit of getting out of troublesome situations. Unless there was a way to render him unable to fight back or escape. The dark force laughed as they knew just the way to immobilize the hero. And now was the perfect time! Pit had just fallen asleep. The dark force put their plan into motion.

When Pit awoke, he was no longer dozing in one of Skyworld's fields but instead in some sort of prison cell strapped to a chair, He was left only in his blue underwear. His tunic and laurel had been taken from him. He looked around a saw...
1132.title: Pit's holiday.

choices: No, give him a chance to digest.
Yes, make him as big as possible
11321.content:
A few of Hades' minions were circled around him as if waiting for a circus. Pit tried to struggle but it was no use, the cuffs that bound him were tougher than they looked.

"Comfortable, Pitty-pat?"

"Hades? B-but I defeated you!"

"You destroyed my body. My soul is still intact and my pets here are more than welcome to carry out my work. Speaking of which, hope you're hungry."

Behind the minions was a plethora of food. They each began approaching Pit but he held his mouth shut.

"Didn't bring your appetite, Pitty-pat? I guess the hose could remedy that."

Pit gulped as a minion brought forward the hose, dripping with a weird liquid. Another one punched him causing him to groan in pain. While his mouth was open, the first one shoved the tube in his mouth. Pit nearly choked as the flow started.

In truth, he didn't think it tasted that bad, in fact it was rather good. He felt compelled to swallow more. One glance down though and the angel wouldn't be so blissed by the taste.

His once flat stomach began expanding outward as the substance piled into his belly. Pit was completely unaware of this, lost in the taste of his torture. Before long, it looked like Pit had swallowed a ball as his gut billowed out into his lap.

Did Hades keep going though?
11321.title: An unhappy reunion

choices: "Everytime you eat it, you only get hungrier."
"It's designed so you only gain weight in your stomach"
113211.content:
Coming back to his senses, Pit noticed all the monsters had gone and the tube he was bring fed with was left dangling in the room. He had been released from his shackles but his cell only had it, a bed and a large pile of food in it.

"Well, at least I won't stave." the angel huffed. That comment brought his attention to his stomach though.

No longer the trained, flat masterpiece it once was, Pit's belly had rounded out and piled into a round gut in his lap. He was unsure how to react, just stunned at how he never noticed his gain. He shook and prodded it. It was heavy and soft, likely due to the fluid that Hades fed him. Standing up, it looked even more unnatural. It sagged a bit but retained it's ball-like shape and jiggled slightly every time he moved. He could barely see his feet.

The act of standing was oddly tiring and caused whatever was inside his stomach to churn so he decided to sit back down, letting his belly rest again on his legs. He instinctively rubbed it to try and calm his gut down.

"Having fun there, Pitty-pat?" Hades voice boomed. Pit didn't respond but curiously didn't stop caressing his stomach. "Oh, feeling mad, are we? Well, I thought you should know something about your food."
113211.title: No, give him a chance to digest.

choices: The gut is right, eat now!
Hold out a short while longer
1132111.content:
"Every time you eat, you'll only get hungry more often. Simple enchantment really. Oh well, ta ta again, Pitty-Pat. I'm a busy soul, got a lot to do. Get it? Ha ha. Toodles."

At first the angel wouldn't believe it, there was no way that was true. If it was then surely he'dbe hungry right-

*Grumble*

"Oh no." The angel remarked. He tried to ignore it and continued rubbing his stuffed belly. He knew if he succumbed once, the effects would stack and there would be a point where he'd never not be hungry.

Just ignore it. Don't look at the pile of delicious, filling, juicy food. Pay no mind to the burger dripping in sauce, cheese melting down the sides. Don't think about the cake, icing glistening in the cell's light. Pit licked his lips.

He was hit with a pain of hunger. He clutched his stomach. He needed that food. No, it'd wear off. Maybe just one. But he'd never stop himself. When has food ever hurt anyone?

His stomach made a compelling argument. In truth, his mind had just been drowned out by the constant rumbling and groaning of his belly.
1132111.title: Feeling hungry

11321112.content: How long dose he not hold out?
11321112.title: Hold out a short while longer

114.content: Who does Pit gain with?
114.title: Double bellies! (Mutual gain)

1141.content: Why do the two gain?
1141.title: Reasons

choices: Laziness and inactivity after the end of Uprising
1142.content: How will the goddess of light and her trusted angel gain weight?
1142.title: Palutena

info.brief_description: Choose a KI:U character to fatten up(Male and Female WG welcome)
info.description:
Since Hades has been defeated, peace has returned to Skyworld. And with that peace, comes some good ole R&R. Which has lead to our heroes falling into decadence. Choose one of your favorite characters from Kid Icarus Uprising and see how they handle their new girth.

1. Keep the grammar and spelling good,
2. Do not make shoddy, short chapters
3. No sex or gore.
4. Do not kill off characters.

Allowed kinks/fetishes

Fat
Weight gain
Stuffing
Force Feeding
Mutual gaining
